ComicInfo.Summary:
Following the direction of the fallen star from the conclusion of Cavewoman: Journey #2, Meriem and Klyde discover that the meteor isn't what they thought it was. Back in town, the merciless gang leader Blackstone has Professor Cook marked for death by a former marine, now mercenary, called 'Tripwire.' Unaware of this, the Prof. and Corporal Mack continue their search to find Meriem, hoping to bring her home and back to Bruce whom she believes is still dead.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Rob Durham | 1 | B | Cover B | Rob Durham | 2 | C | Cover C | Rob Durham | Missing | D | Cover D | Budd Root | 3 | E | Special Edition Nude Cover | Budd Root | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-12 18:44:36. [CVDB462528]
ComicInfo.Characters: Bob Cook, Bruce Kabbit, Francis Reicher II, John Marstone, Klyde, Lieutenant Mack, Matthew Blackstone, Meriem Cooper, Patricia Lavery, Saydee Munsell, Tripwire
